com.aisandbox.cmd.cmds

Class AttackCmd

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.aisandbox.cmd.cmds.BotCommand
      • com.aisandbox.cmd.cmds.AttackCmd

  • public class AttackCmd
extends BotCommand
    Commands a bot to attack a specified position. If an enemy bot is seen by this bot, it will be attacked.

    • Field Summary

    • Constructor Detail

      • AttackCmd

        public AttackCmd(java.lang.String bot,
         Vector2 target,
         Vector2 lookAt,
         java.lang.String description)
        Class constructor. Set all attributes of this command.
        Parameters:
        bot - The name of the bot to control
        target - The target destination (Vector2) for the bot
        lookAt - An optional position (Vector2) which the bot should look at while moving; null if this should be the walking direction
        description - A description of the intention of the bot; only shown if commander.setVerbose(true)

      • AttackCmd

        public AttackCmd(java.lang.String bot,
         java.util.List<Vector2> targets,
         Vector2 lookAt,
         java.lang.String description)
        Class constructor. Set all attributes of this command.
        Parameters:
        bot - The name of the bot to control
        targets - A list of target destination waypoints (Vector2) for the bot
        lookAt - An optional position (Vector2) which the bot should look at while moving; null if this should be the walking direction
        description - A description of the intention of the bot; only shown if commander.setVerbose(true)
